div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxviij die aprilis anno quo Supra

The saide day the wif of Johne Sanclar' was in Ane amerciament
of the court be hir avne tong' gravnt for the brekin of common'
ordinance in Selling of xij penny aill agane the statutis and
actis of the tovne and to amende as law wile and forber' in tym'
to cum /

The saide day Isabe ranisone the wif of James Srathachin
was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Johne Ratre forspekar for
the brekin of commone ordinance in Selling of tuelf penny
aill and to amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to cum

The said' day Robert Walcar' lauchfullie warnit callit and
nocht comperit to ansuer' at the Instance of the aldirman for the
quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionum Curie quod thomas
wastsone est filius ac legittimis ac propinquior heres quondam
Alexandri Watsone patris suj et cetera Igitur datum fuit in mandatis
ballivis ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terram suam et cetera

The said' day the counsale ande Communite warnit
lauchfullie and throw the haile tovne be the premunicion' of the
hande bell and gathtreit Circualy Inquerit be Williame
Scrimgeour officiar maide Constituit and ordanit Alexander menyes
aldirman Dauid menyes Alexander chamer gilbert menyes Johnne colisone and Johne mar'
procuratoris and thar lauchfule commissaris coniunctlie and Seueralie with pouir
to substitut to follow persew sere Jonhne ruthirfurde knicht for the
gudis aving to the kirkwark of the saide burghe' Ande for the
commone gudis aving to the saide burghe' befor our Souerane lorde
and his lordis of counsale quhatsumeuire day and place with continuacioun'
of dais in the Souerast wis' Ande ordanit to Seill the said procura /
tory / to be Selit with thar commone Seile be the personis present for the tym'
representand the bodie of the towne

The saide day the Counsal and Communite being present for the tyme Circualy
Inquerit be Willame scrimgeour officiar' ordanit and amide thomas leslie
and Johne of mar' cniunctilie and Seueralie thar procuratouris with pouir to substitut
to defend' the actioun' persevit agane thame be mastir Androw Cadiow
Anent the clame of certane fischingis et cetera quhatsumeuire Juge comperit
ande ordanit to Sele he procuratory to be maid' tharupone vndir
thar commone sell

The saide day Robert Walcar was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Alexander Rede
forspekar for myspersoning of Alexander menyeis aldirman and strubulance sayande
thar was neuire luk in his tyme and hefande the bole of meile iiijor and he
will leif it at xxti and with mony vthir and diuers' Iniurious and perturbious' lanagis
and rehers' quhilkis efferis nocht to be Reherssit for the quhilkis the saide Robert was
in ane Amerciment of the court and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera Ande
the saide Robert he was nocht complanteous' of the said aldirman nothir in worde
nore deid' Ande the assis' Referrit the Amendis to the balyeis and consale

The said day It was fundin and deliuirit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander Rede
forspekar that geroge barbour' sal bruk the hous' that he has in tak of
Johne Colison' quhile thre yeris be Runnyn fra his first entre
tharto

Eodem die Johannes Robertsone fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem annande suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem dandum et concedendum
eidem suam potestatem ac omnimodam potestatem facultatem ac mandatum
Speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum patricium chernsid' pro
testatem et xxiiij pellibus omnes et xij s' monete scocie sibi debito et eosdem
pelles et precium feir competens precium recipiendum de Receptis acquitandum Agendum
defendum prosequendum Communionem omniam et Singulam faciendum et excercendum et promittens
de Rato et grato in vberiora forma procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis
et oportunis
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene penultimo die aprilis anno quo Supra

Eodem die marioria moir' amerciatur per Juratam assisam ex ore Dauid blinsele prelocutorem
eiusdem pro perturbio empcione victualium presentatem eorundem ad forum et
contra Communionem ordinacioni burgi Et Agnes bavne similiter amerciatur et quilibet
earundem emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Alexander moresone amerciatur per dictam assisam pro empcione victualium et regratacione eorundem
vicinus suis quj emendabit ut Jura volunta

Eodem die Johannes auchneiwe deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander moresone et Sponse
sua erunt Indempnes pro Johanne ray et Sponse sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et
Johannes balcrome deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes ray et Sponsa sua erunt
Indempnes pro prefato alexandro et vxore sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet obligatur
ad releuandum suo plegio de huismodi fideiussione

The saide day Johne balcromy yongar grantit him aving to thomas Waus tua barrellis
of Salmonde ful rede and Suet gude and Sufficient merchande gude of the richtuys'
bynde of Abirdene for Redy money resauit fra him quhilkis tua barrellis of Salmond' he
oblist him to pay to the said' thomas be the fatht of his body at Witsonday next hereftir
follouing or ithin xv dais thareftir at the farrast In presence of Dauid mar' balye Johne
Sanclar' William scrimgeour and Androw mar' sergeandis

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdme quinto die mensis Maij
Anno quosupra

The saide the baillies asssignit this day fiftene dais the xix day of maij
to schir Johnne ruthirford knicht tile ansuer to the borgh' strekit one him be gilbert
menyeis in the handis of Androw nachty officiar for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra
him of xxxv s' vj d' for ane elne and half ane quarter of paris' Rede and ane vnce
of blak sewine silke

The said day thome Walcar the said alderman and baillie assignit
mononday that nixt cumis to thomas Walcar tile ansuer to the borgh' strekit
one him be Robert Walcar Ande the said thoams tak tile ansuer to the
said borgh' othir negative or affirmative the said day

Eodem die Jacobus collisone fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit
gilbertum menyeis magistrum Johannem badenagh' Duncanum collisone thomam
Waus et dominum andream collisone coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores
dantes et concedentes eisdem ac eorum cuilibet ac suj substitunt pluribus aut vnj suam
liberam et omnimodam potestatem pro se et nomine suo ad respondendum georgio smyth et Johanni
smyth filio suo in omnibus actionibus debatabilibus inter huiusmodi partes ac in omnibus
aliis causis et actionibus dictum Jacobum Agendum defendendum prosequendum et
calumpniandum Ceteram omnia alia et singula faciendum gerendum et excercendum
Promittendo de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris
clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Alexander morisone amerciatur per assisam Jurata ex
ore Alexandrj chamer prelocutoris curie assise per perturbio Johannis William
sone wobstar cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Et soluet vnam libram
Cere ad lumen sancti Sanguinis Insuper deliberatum fuit per dictam
assisam quod si dictus alexander aliquam vicinum huius burgj
et inde quitus fuit vigintj s' ad fabricam ecclesie sanctj nicholaij

Eodem die alexander chamer deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander
morisone erit indempnes pro Johanne Williamsone aliter quam per
viam Juris Et alexander reid erit indempnes deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus Johannes erit indempnes pro dicto alexnadro aliter quam
per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum partium obligatur ad conseruandum
suos pelgios indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

Eodem die Willelmis ffuthes quitus de perturbio Johannis Cuk
sergeandj per dictam sssiam ex pre alexandrj chamer prelocu
torem eiusdem

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In rpetorio eisudem octauo
die maij Anno quo Supra

The saide day the borghe' fudnin apone thomas Walcar
be Robert Walcar' that he Intromettit with ane pece of clath
quhilkis was deliuirit to him to wirk and dicht quhilkis was
Spilt be the Intrometing of the saide thomas becaus' he
warnit nocht the said Robert and was fundin availl be ane
Suorne assis' Johne Steuinsone forspekar for the quhilkis
the saide thoams was in ane Amerciamenti of the court and freithe the
said Robert of the Skatht done to the said clatht et cetera

The saide day Robert Walcar grauntit to pay viij s'
and iiij d' to Williame blinsele coupar within viij dais

The saide day Johne Robertsone tuk to preiwe this
day viij dais that patry chernsid' has Intromettit
with xixxx and four Skinnis of his and aw to gif him
Compt rekning and pament fo the Samyn'

The said' day the borghe' fundin apone thome Walcar
be Williame Walcar that wranguislie and Agane the
law he hade latting furtht the wattir of the Clois'
apone the myln' that he hes in tak throu the quhilk
the saide myln is brokin in the said' thomas defalt
and he aw to amende the Skatht and was fundin
awall be ane Suorne assis' Johne Stevinsone
forspekar for the quhilkis the saide thomas was in
Amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' day It was deliuerit ordanit and decretit
be the Counsale for the gret offence and traspas'
Committit be Robert Walcar in the gallougat to Aexander
menyes aldirman eftir the tenor of the act maid' obfor
be deliuerance of ane Suorne assis' Alexander rede forspekar
that the said' Robert sale Cum in the Opin Court furthwitht
and Sytt done one his kneys and besek the saide Alexander aldirman
of forgiwnes and Remit Ande to the bannist expellit ande
Secludit the tone at the wull o the said aldirman Ande
gif euire the saide Robert happinnis to commit ony offence
to the saide aldirman or ony vthir balye or Officiar in tym' to cum
he salbe expellit bannist and Remouyt of the towne doe his
demeritis ande Offence done in tymez bigane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tena In
pretorio eiusdem xij die mensis maij Anno quo Supra

The saide day margaret Kyndiche and Alexander moderak
hir' Sous' grauntit that the lande pertening to the saide
margaret liande with the saide burghe' in the gallougat
one the Est part of the samyn betuix the lande of gilbert
menyeis one the Southt part Ande the gray freris place
on the northt part was avande yerlie to Androw
Kymdy his ayris or assginez' ane annuele Rent of tua
markis vsuale money of Scotlande be chartir sesin and
possessioun' with him his ayris and Assignez' to Remane
ay and to the tyme fourty merkis be pait ale and to giddir
atanys vpone ane day / Eftir the tenor of the Reuersion'
maid' tharupone Ande to mak thankfull pament
of the saide annuell ay and quhill the saide Some be
pait Apone the quhilkis Robert blinsele askis Instrument
vndir the Seill of Johne of mar' or thomas lesly
balyes befor thir witnes sere Johne ruthirfurde Alexander Rede
mastir Androw Cadiow gilbert menyes Johne Colison' androw
Cullan and vthir diuers'

The saide day thome lammyngtone warnit lauchfullie callit
an nocht Comperit to Ansuer to James hill for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of xiiij s' and i stane of talche of maile was
in Ane amerciament of the Court As he that grantit befor the balyis
one monunday last bigane to Comper the saide day with
his witnes that he allegit to Ande ansuer perempturlie
to the saide James Anent the haldin of the saide male
and talche for the quhilkis the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj
sergeande to as' and tak ane Stres' of the saide Thomas
et cetera Ande warne him to Comper befor thame one mo
nunday to Ansuer in the premiss'

The saide day the ballieis chargit gilbert prestone to decist fra
the occupacioun of the pece of yarde vnto the tyme he schew his
ricth tharto becuas' Johne malisone et Anny malisone his doucthir
has bene in vys' breuking the Samyne certane yeris bigane

The saide day gilbert prestone protestit Solempntlie quhat the
balyeis dide this day Anent the pece of lande and tale
of yarde clamit be him one that ane part Ande clamit
be Anny malisone one that vthir part suld turne him to nay preiudice

Johannes ruthirfurde miles Robetus blinsele Alexnader rede gilbertus
menyes magister Andreas Cadiow Andreas Cullane patricius leslie
Willelmus Wormet Johannes ratre patricius rede Johannes Kintor
Johannes Collisone Willelmus Kyntor Johannes Auchneiwe
et Andreas Cristesone burgensis dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod
quondam Andreas Kandich' pater margarete Kandich' latricis
obiit vltra vestitus et Sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et
fidem dominj nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
gilberti menyes ex australi ex vna et domum fratrum de
obseruancia ex boreali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam
versus occidens et terras dictorum gilberti et domus fratrum versus
oriens et de quadam pecia orti Jacente inter gavulum parietis
dicte domus ex occidentali extendenti in longitudine ad Communionem viam
regiam versus oriens et terram dicti glberti versus austrum et domum
dictorum fratrum versus boream Et quod dicta margareta est legittime et proximus
heres dicti quondam Andree patris suj de dicta terra et petra orti cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra et petra terra orti cum pertinenciis
valent nunc per annum decim s' et valuerunt vj s' viij d' tempore pacis
Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgum
Et nunc existunt in manibus dominj nostri Regis per spacium xij Annorum
aut eocirca in defectu heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis

The saide day the baillieis directit and ordanit Androw
nachtj officiar' to pas' at the Instance of Dauy Colp
and befor Sufficient witnes warne and charge t thome
ridaill and Williame Rollande to Remoiwe and flyt out
of the hous' that thai Occupy / pertening to him as tutor
to the ayr of vmquhill Williame buichane at this nixt wit
sonday

The saide day / the baillieis assignit this day viij days
to mastir Androw patirsone to preiwe that he is
knavin' and entirit ayr to vmquhill Dauy paterson his' fadir
Ande to Johne of auchnewe to ansuer' to the saide mastir
androw In his wiffis name Anent the gudis clamit of airschipe
be him Ande in likuis' the saide mastir Androw to ansuer' to the
saide Johne and his wif in the gudis of airschip clamit be tham
as ayris to vmquhile William of gareauche

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvto
die maij Anno quosupra

The said day comperit Johanne robertsone ande producit certane witnes
in the caus' debatabile betuix him ande patrik chernsid Anent xixxx and four
skinnis . of the quhilkis the deposicionis was ressauit / ande for waiknes of the
court the ballies continewit the opinyng of the saide deposicionis to friday
that nixt cumis

The said day thomas lamyntone lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit tile haue
ansuerit to Copin hill for xiiij s' and a petir talecht et cetera and the ballies
chargit William scrimgeour officiar to pas and tak ane stres' et cetera and lat it
to borgh' gif it be askit and warne him to friday the xix day of maij
to ansuer to the said copin et cetera
